Sequence Information.Peptide Name: W544 (Synthetic AMPs, Trp-rich; Arg-rich; XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Mechesso AF, Su Y, Xie J, Wang G. 2023
Literature.Title: Enhanced Antimicrobial Screening Sensitivity Enabled the Identification of an Ultrashort Peptide KR-8 for Engineering of LL-37mini to Combat Drug-Resistant Pathogens

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (87.5%) toW543. W: 50%; R: 38%. GRAVY: -1.66; M Wt: 1344.591; M formula:  C68H93N21O9, mol ex coeff: 22200.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 4 uM), S. aureus USA300 (MIC 4 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 4 uM), K. pneumoniae (MIC 16-32 uM), and A. baumannii (MIC 16-32 uM) in MHB.Toxicity: human RBC: HC50 80 uM hemolytic.
